"Hahaha! So you were able to hold me bac: "On this planet, there was someone strong enough to face me. And now..."
"Hahahaha! This is fun, ARKS! I'm glad I came back."
"You finally came back, only to get your ass handed to you... and you're happy about that?"
"Did you go crazy while you were sealed away for those 40 years or something?"
"...Who are you?"
"Wait... I remember this feeling..."
"I see! So you're [Apprentice]! That body must be a new vessel."
"That's right, but even though you say \"new,\" it's already been ten years."
"And the two over there must be... [Double]!"
"Hahaha! So you all came out to greet me! I'm touched!"
"But... who the hell is that?"
"A new face. For the time being, I've just been calling him [Persona]."
"Really, I have no idea what young people are thinking these days..."
"As long as it doesn't interfere with my fun, I don't really care."
"What's with that disgusted look on your face? You really have gone nuts."
"Like you're one to talk."
"ARKS! I had a good fight today! I'll return, for now."
"But as long as I have this body, I can fight at any time!"
"I plan on having fun for a long time. Do your best to hold out, ARKS!"
